item.title: Civil defence mock drill conducted in Raichur
item.description:
<![CDATA[
Raichur/ Kalaburagi: The civil defence team conducted a thorough safety exercise on the RTPS premises, Shaktinagar, demonstrating vital emergency response procedures on Friday.The exercise showcased essential actions required during emergencies. The team provided detailed instructions on recognising emergency alarms and taking immediate refuge inside buildings.The session featured hands-on demonstrations of safety measures, including correct positioning and protection methods against potenti...]]>
item.author: Tnn
